description: Additional files required to run the Water Demo workflow

gromos_settings.description: LT macros defining the settings for the GROMOS force field.

md_tasks.description: LT file macros to perform different MD simulations, e.g. microcanonical, canonical etc.

random_init.description: LT file macro to initialise a variable containing a random seed.

force_field.idescription: LT file containing the force field definition of one or more molecules.

input_structure_pdb.description: Initial structure of an atomistic sample in PDB format.
